entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -42.0°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
